__prompts__.company: Author's company (or full_name again if no company)
__prompts__.repo_name: Name of the repository that's been created and cloned from GitHub
__prompts__.module_name: CamelCase name for your PowerShell module. Make sure it's available on powershellgallery.com!
__prompts__.initial_version: The initial version of the module that will be released when the first production release is made
__prompts__.minimum_pwsh_version: Should be 5.1 if you want to support Windows PowerShell. Otherwise, should be set to the lowest currently supported version: https://endoflife.date/powershell
